Volunteer

We are always looking for people with different skills who can join u to achieve our future vision. Join us on our next tour to Nepal.

Learn more

Buy a product

When you buy a product it creates more demand which enables us to employ more margianlised women in Nepal. Your buying choices make a huge difference. Buy fair trade.

Learn more

Visit us in Nepal

if you are in nepal or know someone going to Nepal, please drop us a line and we can arrange a tour, for you to our centre. We have a range of activities you can book in for at our centre such as cooking classes, basic nepali for travellers, or craft classes.

Learn more

Donate

We are always greatful of donations that enable us to continue to grow the number of women we involve in our important work.

Learn more

Get in touch

Seven Women Supporters

Seven Women

Seven Women has socially and economically empowered over 5000 women in Nepal through literacy, skills training and income-generation programs. 

Feel free to send us an email at steph.w@seven-women.com
